synopsis.text: As college student Akane Kinoshita navigates the treacherous waters of a broken heart after her boyfriend's infidelity, she finds solace in an online game, Forest of Savior. While venting her frustrations to a fellow gamer, Akito Yamada, she receives an indifferent response, only to later encounter him at an offline event. As Akane's path intertwines with Yamada's both in-game and in real life, she discovers his legendary status in the gaming world, but also his lack of interest in anything beyond it. As her feelings for Yamada grow, can she capture the attention of a man who seems solely focused on the virtual realm? Join Akane and Yamada in a tale of love, heartbreak, and the world of online gaming.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
